Summary: 20 to 30 amber lights moved across the sky south of a friends house.
divs: Sighting Details20 to 30 amber lights moved across the sky south of a friends house. on 4-27-13 at about 11:15pm. in north west orange county florida.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Apopka
